revision.text: Possibly: Meditations and Contemplations. In Two Volumes. Containing Vol. I. Meditations among the Tombs. Reflections on a Flower-Garden; And, a Descant on Creation. Vol. II. Contemplations on the Night. Contemplations on the Starry Heavens; and, A Winter-Piece. By James Hervey, A.B. Late of Lincoln-College, Oxford. (London : Printed for John and James Rivington, at the Bible and Crown in St. Paul's Church-Yard; and J. Leake, at Bath, M.DCC.LXIX. [1749]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2413854~S1
